data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 89,800 people living in Thimphu, Bhutan. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Thimphu, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Thimphu.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Thimphu, Bhutan need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Thimphu, Bhutan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Chhetri people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Chhetri people.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Thimphu, Bhutan to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Thimphu unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.section_summary:
the state of Thimphu, Bhutan has a population of 89,800.

We estimate Thimphu has 180 people who might know Jesus, 629 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 88,992 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 498 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Thimphu.
